name: Drums in the deep
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - direction of light

Hunted down by glowing entity

Inspired by The Terminator (1984)

"Planned features:

- Guns, just to deter, not destroy

- Variable lights

- One sided ai gunfights

- Raycasting to add proper "I see you"

-Leading ai to the "exit"

- Bullet penetration for the term bullets so it's super badass when they wipe someone and you have to worry about the rounds hitting you

- Overall, hopefully, just better"
